examples.bullet: Led cross-functional team of 12 to implement automated quality inspection system, reducing defect rate 27% while accelerating throughput 15%.
Optimized ETL pipelines processing 8M+ records/day, cutting latency from 42 to 11 minutes and lowering infra cost 18%.
Implemented Lean Kaizen initiatives across 3 facilities, eliminating 240 labor hours per month and saving $310K annually.
Engineered containerized deployment workflow (Docker + CI) shrinking release cycle from weekly to daily and improving rollback reliability.
Analyzed customer churn patterns using cohort segmentation and predictive signals, informing retention playbook that lifted renewals 9%.
